10: Lower logic: Great Moss
10_s0: Start state
10_s1: Substate: Start
10_s2: Lower state: Initial setting
10_s2_e0: [Attack] Damage lower logic reset setting
10_s2_e1: [General purpose] Sharing flag setting
10_s3: Target action: Great Moss_SubState
x0: Target action: Great Moss
x0_s0: Start state
x0_s1: Target action: start
x0_s2: Target action: waiting
x0_s2_e0: [Random number] Random number generation
x0_s3: Target action: Action 10: Scatter scales A
x0_s3_e0: [Attack] Melee attack
x0_s4: Target action: Action 12: Scatter the scales violently
x0_s4_e0: [Attack] Melee attack

x0_s6: Target action: Action 11: Scatter scales B

x0_s8: End state
